" To who ever finds this device used it to make a BIG Impact or if you so choose a Small Impact"

15411222122.title: Find another Diva

choices: Stephanie decides to become stronger than men!
Stephanie decides to first be young again!
15431.content:
Stephanie McMahon walked in the locker room with a sigh.

She was tired. Years and years of hard work, trying to make a difference and... she couldn't say things were going the way she wanted. It was like despite her best efforts, she simply couldn't win the fight against destiny. Maybe the bad guys always lose in the end...

And this was precisely what she was thinking when she walked in the locker room.

"What's this?" she said as she noticed the weird box in the middle of the locker room. A letter on it read :

"To who ever finds this device used it to make a BIG Impact or if you so choose a Small Impact"

"What kind of joke is that?" she shook her head "Not even a funny one with that..."

She opened the box out of curiosity, and inside found what looked like an old smartphone. Or maybe a small tablet. She couldn't really tell. The moment she grabbed it, the screen turned on, and Stephanie saw a perfect replica of herself, standing, arms spread, like some kind of videogame character.

"Subject scan... complete - Stephanie McMahon"

"What the hell?" she blinked.

But as she checked the screen, she saw numbers popping. Height, weight, strength... and actually, every data she was thinking about seemed to be popping on screen, with next to it a dial, numbers, arrows... out of curiosity, she toyed with the "hair length" dial. And chuckled as on the screen, her hair grew longer and longer... so long that it was soon rubbing against her ass.

"It looks so realistic..." she said before she felt something brushing against her ass. She gasped, turned, and as she did, hair wayyyy longer than she was supposed to have flew in the air. She immediately turned back the dial to its normal position, and her hair returned to normal.

"This is real!" she exclaimed "Real!"

And more data popped on screen as she thought about them : "Size" "Strength" "Age", "Bra size"...

She grinned.

Today, maybe the bad guys could win...
15431.title: Stephanie McMahon

choices: Attack of the 50 feet tall Stephanie!
154311.content:
Stephanie grinned. As she read the height number : 5'8.

Today, not only the bad guys could win... but not just in WWE. She could become the queen of the bad guys. Actually, she could become the biggest, baddest girl ever. They thought WWE was just a show? She was going to become the most powerful woman ever... for real. And her ambitions weren't fake. They were real. And BIG.

"Look at me guys... because today, the world is about to change!"

She toyed with the height dial. 5'8 became 6'0.

In answer, she felt a strange tingling in her body, and as she looked up from the screen, her perspective was changing. She was looking at the locker room from higher. And higher. It worked! Meaning...

"Bigger." she smirked as she turned the dial further.

6'0 became 6'6.

She noticed not only the growth was happening faster, but her clothes were growing along. She was simply expanding in all directions. As she looked at the floor moving further, she smiled. Just like at the end of an elevator ride, she felt the growth stopping. She was a clean 6'6. Not even speaking of the heels she had. Meaning right now, she was one of the biggest, strongest women the WWE ever saw. She smiled.

"Not just one." she whispered to herself "Bigger!" she repeated.

She turned the dial from 6'6 to 7'6. A whole foot taller!

This time, she could almost feel something shaking deep inside her, like her insides expanding with her. The whole room looked like it was shrinking around her. God, this feeling was amazing! She was getting so big! She stared as she suddenly grew higher than the doorframe. She reached 7'6... and knew she was an amazon now. No girl could beat her now. And men would need to team up to hope to have a chance!

Should she stop here?

Of course not.

"I'm a bad girl..." she whispered, amused.

And pushed the dial all the way to 9'6.

"Yes!" she exclaimed as she started expanding again. This time, she could almost hear herself growing! She looked up with a smile as now, she was getting closer to the ceiling! Every single second, this thing which used to be so high above her was getting closer! And as she looked up, her nose was so close to it when the growth stopped.

She was too big for the door now. She'd need to bow to get in or out any room. And fighting... now even a whole team of strong men couldn't compete with him.

"But I want more than a show... all hail your new queen!"

She turned the dial. More. And more. Until even her couldn't believe the number she was reading.

"It's going to be a BIG one!" she laughed...

* * *


Becky Lynch was on her way to the locker room with a grin. A member of the security staff just told her Stephanie got in the locker room. Becky grinned as she knocked at the door.

"You locked yourself in there? Afraid? Because I've been working hard and pumping iron, and girl, I wanted to tell you, now, you and your friends don't stand a ch..."

She heard a rumble. A loud one. Growing inside the locker room. The knob started shaking. The door too. The walls too?!

"What's happeni..."

The door and wall in front of her burst. Two enormous breasts pushed out of them, and gigantic arms and legs moved on each side of her. But before she could move, she was engulfed by the expanding, dark cleavage, while more and more walls burst in every direction, people fleeing the expanding Stephanie outgrowing everything she touched...

But just how big was she going to be?
154311.title: Stephanie decides to go big!

choices: Actually, she doesn't feel that big...
1543112.content:
Becky Lynch gasped as she was back to the real world after having plunged into a warm chasm of darkness.

"Who was trapped in there?" said a booming voice.

Becky looked up in awe to see the massive face of Stephanie growing above her, smiling down at her puny form. While under her, the ground was shaking... oh no! She was standing in the middle of the palm of Stephanie's hand, and she was still growing!

"How?! Stop this! This is madness!" Becky begged.
"Stop? Mmmm... what about not?" laughed Stephanie, still expanding, dust on her shirt "But since I heard you bragging earlier... let's do this: wrestle my thumb. If you can beat a single of my fingers, I'll stop growing."

Becky didn't have a choice. Whatever was happening here, the sake of the world was in her hands. She looked at the fingers growing around her like a cage. Stephanie's thumb was smaller than her right now, at 5'0. She ran to it, and tried to bring it down. She used all her strength, and at first, the thumb started going down.

"Yes..." she gasped between efforts.

But she could feel it growing between her arms. Getting bigger. Stronger. Stephanie, smiling, looked at the girl getting smaller and smaller compared to her fingers. Within seconds, Becky had to fight a thumb as big as she was... then bigger. Then MUCH bigger. Until she was fighting a pillar of flesh she couldn't even move. She fell on her ass, panting.

"One of my fingers is stronger than you are... how disappointing!" laughed Stephanie "Now, join your little friends down there, you're not even worth touching me!"

She dropped her to the ground, where she'd have a perfect sight of the expanding giantess.

"Time to have a stroll!" the louder and louder voice of the giantess said.

* * *


Meanwhile, downtown, it was a perfectly normal day. People were walking in the streets, doing some shopping or just working in offices

When people froze.

Lights were flickering downtown. Both in the streets and in the buildings. And did the ground just shake? Everyone was looking around, wondering what just happened.

And it happened again. The lights flickered more. The ground shook again, and more. People in the buildings were going to the windows, trying to find out what was happening.

Right when a gigantic face appeared right in front of one of these buildings, full of offices, facing hundreds of shocked and terrified people, as they faced the several stories high face of Stephanie, smiling at them wide.

"Hi, small people!" she just said.

She had grown to a tremendous 1,000 feet tall. And God, she loved it.

Her heels were holing the streets, breaking through water pipes, turning her footprints into pools. She took another step, looking down to see crowds of ridiculously small people fleeing away with distant screams. She smiled at her reflection in the windows of another building.

"Not bad!" she grinned "Who can stop such a beauty now?"

Behind the windows, she saw the people running for the fire exits. She just grabbed the side of the building, smaller than she was now, and shook. People fell to the floor in complete chaos. She couldn't stop laughing. She was so strong!

What could stop her now?
1543112.title: Stadium sized Stephanie!

choices: She goes even farther in muscle strength
She Stop and focus on an other thing
154312.content:
Stephanie moves the mouse cursor to strength, I want to be the strongest person alive but 200 pounds isn’t enough so here goes she thinks in her head.

She began moving the bar up to in increase her muscle strength,
Her body started to grow thicker as her muscle becomes bigger and more toned with every movement of the bar. This feels amazing having all this power but I’m want more she continued to increase her strength.

Her muscle were busting out the clothes she was wearing as they grew even stronger. Reaching 30 inch biceps and calf and still growing her body look like the hulk. I’m so muscular now that should do it, the strength meter read off 800 lb.

Stephanie through she was done but then she look up strongest person in the world currently could lift 975 lb so now Stephanie need to be able to lift up more then that so she increase the bar again to 1000 pounds her body shake the ground beneath her as her muscle expanded to be able to lift that much weight and her wooden were cracking underneath her feet do to have much she weight after the final growth.

She stand up at look at herself reflection from her door mirror.
Her was standing at 7 feet tall now do to her muscle growth, I’m so strong she said as she began flexing her new muscle ripping the rest of her clothes off. Then she throughs should I go for more or do something else.

15432.content: How about Candice Lerae from NXT?
15432.title: SE

154321.content:
Candice Lerae was annoyed. She had been in NXT for a while now yet she hadn't been given
a proper opportunity at a title. She had a chance but was once again beaten, as she walked into
the locker room backstage where she came across the other women. "Why don't I ever get a
chance", she asked.

Rhea, Bianca, Charlotte and Shayna and the rest of the locker room told her it was because she was too
small and friendly causing her to get upset. She stormed out of the locker room angrily and went to her
own locker room."Too small, I'll show them", she said to herself. Just then, she noticed a plastic
gun in the corner.

"What is this"? Candace said as she picked the gun up. She saw that it said size gun and saw the two
options, Grow and Shrink. She smiled to herself as she stood up with the gun in her hand deciding what to
do. "Revenge time. Now do I grow myself or shrink them all"? She asked herself.

What does she decide to do?
154321.title: Yes

1543211.content:
"I think I'll shrink the others first", Candace said to herself. She walked out of where she
was and made her way to the women's locker room, as she got there she stopped to
think about how she does this. "Do I shrink them all at once, or do I do it bit by bit and take
my time", she asked herself.

She made her decision and she decided to _________
1543211.title: Shrinks the other women

choices: Have fun with the 4 women for now
15432111.content:
Candace decided to shrink the women bit by bit so that nobody got too over suspicious. She
looked in the locker room and saw only 4 people in there, the so called locker room leaders Rhea,
Bianca, Charlotte and Shayna. "Perfect", Candace thought. To shrink the main women in the
roster would be the best way to show off her dominance.

Candace walked into the locker room and to her locker acting as if nothing had happened, until
Shayna spoke up. "Aww, is poor Candace upset that nobody cares about her". The others joined
in with Shayna, "Yeah, don't worry kid, you can just lose to us if you want to stay relevant", Charlotte
said as the other 3 women laughed. Candice said nothing before she turned around and pulled the
trigger on the ray, shrinking Charlotte and Shayna to half a foot tall.

Each woman in the room looked shocked at what had just happened. "You bitch, what did you do",
Bianca said charging at Candace. Candace quickly pulled the trigger on the ray again shrinking Bianca
to the same size as the other 2 women. "Candace, what the hell are you doing, STOP"! Rhea shouted,
trying to reason with Candace, but she was done listening. Once more, she pulled the trigger and hit Rhea,
shrinking her to half a foot as well.

Candace laughed as the 4 women stood there shocked looking up at the now giant Candice who not even
two minutes ago was looking up at them. Candace was loving this, "Look at this, I've got the 4 most powerful
women in NXT at my feet", she said happily. "Grow us back you psycho", Shayna screamed. "As if you're
actually trying to tell me what to do, you're not in a position to do that tiny", Candace said putting emphasis on
the word tiny.

"What to do next, should I have some fun with these guys or add some more women to my collection"? Candace
asked herself. What does she decide to do next?
15432111.title: Shrink them bit by bit

154321112.content:
"I have a match right now but I think I'm going to find some more women to shrink to join you guys afterwards",
Candace said to the shrunken four. "Whilst I do that, I need to make sure that you tinies don't end up getting lost".
Candace stood there thinking about what she was going to do. "I have two ideas, you guys could either come with
me to my match, or I keep you in my locker", she told the women.

The girls looked at each other scared at the thought of having to go with Candace whilst she was having a match
so they hoped that she would just lock them in her locker. "I've decided what I'm going to do with you guys", she said
to the women.

"You guys are going to......."

What does Candice decide to do with the shrunken women?
154321112.title: She searches for more women

1543211121.content:
"You guys are going to come with me for my match", Candice said happily. "How are you going to
do that, everybody will see us you weirdo", Charlotte said which annoyed Candice. She picked each
woman up and placed them in her palm. "Don't worry about that, I know just where to put all of you",
she said with an evil smile. With that, she took a seat in the locker room and removed both of her
shoes, giving the women a good view.

All 4 women looked horrified, they begged and pleaded with Candice to not put them there but she
wasn't listening. "Nope, you 4 are going in my shoes for my match, and you guys better hope I win
because if I don't, I will be angry and you guys wouldn't want me to be angry", Candice said angrily,
threatening each of the women.

She then put Bianca and Rhea in her right shoe and Charlotte and Shayna in her left shoe before
putting her feet back inside, trapping each of the women beneath her feet, "Now this is something that
I could get used to", Candice said as she left the locker room for her match.

What was the result of the match?
1543211121.title: The women join Candice for her match

choices: "Hell Yeah, this is going to be great" (Best friends dominating NXT)
"No way, you need to grow them back" (Time for Tegan to shrink)
15432112.content:
Candace decided that she would shrink all of the women that laughed at her in the locker room.
She walked back into the locker room hiding the ray gun, acting like nothing had happened. She
walked to her locker and stuffed the ray inside before turning around and sitting down looking at
everyone. There were 11 women in the locker room other than herself, Charlotte Flair, Rhea Ripley,
Bianca Belair, Shayna Baszler, Dakota Kai, Chelsea Green, Io Shirai, Mia Yim, Jessamyn Duke,
Marina Shafir and Raquel Gonzalez.

"Perfect", Candace thought to herself as she saw pretty much the full roster was in the locker room
all at once. Just then she was interrupted by Charlotte who teased her over not being able to accomplish
anything. "I've been back in NXT for less than a month and I've still won more titles than you", she said.
All the women laughed at Charlotte's joke making Candace more angry, suddenly she grabbed the ray gun
from her locker and hit everyone with it, shrinking them all to the size of half a foot.

All of the women were scared and in shock at what had just happened but Candace just looked down at the
scared women and laughed before saying. "Finally, I have you all where I want you, for so long you all looked
down on me, but now it's my turn", she said happily. All of a sudden Candace heard a voice, it was the voice of
Candace's best friend Tegan Nox who was calling her. She quickly picked up all the women and placed them in
her locker and shut it.

Tegan walked into the room and asked Candace, "Have you seen Dakota, we have a match in 5 minutes"?
Candace decides to tell Tegan what she did with everybody, "Come here", she said leading Tegan to her locker.
She opened up her locker and to Tegan's surprise, there were 11 small women looking right back at her. "Candace,
what did you do"? She asked shocked. "Do you like it, I found this neat size gun and used it one them when they
were being mean"? Candace told Tegan.

Tegan just stood there shocked not being able to speak, keeping her eyes on all of the women, but focusing more
on her former friend Dakota. "What are you going to do with them"? Tegan asked. "Well I haven't decided yet but it
won't be good for them, that's for sure", Candace said scaring the shrunken women. Candace then got an idea, "Hey,
do you want to join me, we could dominate the division together", Candace said hoping her best friend would join her.

What did Tegan say?
15432112.title: She shrinks all of the women in the locker room

1543221.content:
Liv made her return to WWE and whilst she's been back she hasn't really had a chance
to show everyone what she's made of. But that's going to change at Money in the bank,
Liv is confident that she's going to win the whole thing but all the other women keep putting
her down. "Don't get your hopes up shorty, you ain't got a chance", Nia told her. "I'm going
to enjoy breaking your arm before I win the match", Shayna told her.

She walked into the locker room before the match and saw that she was by herself and she
noticed a small ray gun in the corner of the room. "What's this"? She asked as she picked it
up. She picked up a note that said, "This is a little gift for those who need it most, a size gun
to either grow yourself or shrink others". "Interesting, I'm definitely going to use this", Liv said
to herself.

Just then Liv was interrupted by a stage hand who told her that it was time for her to make her
way out to the ring. "Coming", she said before she looked back at the gun and decided to take
it out with her. "I could use this to win the match", she thought to herself. She was still figuring
out whether she should grow herself or shrink the other women.
1543221.title: Yes

Liv made her way to the ring along with the other competitor in order they where

Live watches as they all entered the ring and notice she was even smaller than Carmella

“Ugh that’s not fair” Liv thought to her self


The match had started and all the women began fighting


About 15 mins in all the woman where down at the hands of Nia Jax

Liv down in the ring watch the amazon Samoan climbing the ladder and she thought it was now or ever and live used the gun on her self and set it to

info.brief_description: when someone in the Women's Division gets there hands-on a Size changing Device
info.description:
What Happens when someone in the Women's Division gets there hands-on a Size changing Device and what fun will they have. Does a Heel get it and use it to her advantage does a baby face get it and get into trouble..



4 simple Rules

- No Vore
- Male Interaction allowed but they cannot grow
- Characters must Remain Dressed
- Keep Chapters to a minimum of 500 Characters
